doc.title: The Jack Benny Program

credit.role: Audience Member sitting next to Jack
Maitre d' of Lotus Blosom Inn
Hank The All Night Disc Jockey

doc.plot: Jack Benny was a regular on his own radio program since 1932. He brought the program, with his underplayed humor, to TV along with his radio regulars. Jack, who remained 39-years-old, kept his money in his basement and drove his old Maxwell car just as he had done on the radio.
